data.label: HUAWEI CaaS Engine
data.description: 畅连能力（CaaS Engine）是华为依托畅连业务通信能力，面向应用开发者和硬件开发者提供的开放接口，可以帮助开发者快速实现应用内视频通话服务。开发者通过华为设备虚拟化服务，可以使用任意视频数据作为视频通话的视频源。

data.label: HUAWEI CaaS Engine
data.description: Changlian Capability (CaaS Engine) is an open interface provided by Huawei relying on Changlian's business communication capabilities, helping application and hardware developers quickly implement in-app video call services. Developers can use any video data as a video source for video calls through Huawei device virtualization services.
